function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate coordination of health services resulting in inadequate responses to health emergencies","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and ineffective containment of outbreaks","Mitigation":"Establish clear lines of communication and coordination between different health departments and services","Technologies":"Communication and coordination tools, such as digital platforms and telemedicine","People":"Health service providers, government health departments","Owner":"Government health departments, hospital management"},{"Description":"Shortage of nursing staff due to fear of infection and lack of clear plan for dealing with COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Overburdened healthcare system, increased risk of disease transmission within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training on infection control, ensure adequate supply of PPE, and implement clear protocols for managing COVID-19 cases","Technologies":"Online training modules, PPE tracking and management systems, digital health record systems","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital management, government health departments","Owner":"Hospital management, government health departments"},{"Description":"Absence of nursing staff due to transportation challenges and curfew restrictions","Impact":"Decreased capacity to provide care, increased workload on remaining staff, and potential spread of disease due to understaffing","Mitigation":"Implement flexible transportation arrangements and accommodations for night shift workers, provide alternative housing options for staff in remote areas, and consider temporary staffing solutions","Technologies":"Transportation management systems, remote work platforms, temporary staffing databases","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital management, government authorities","Owner":"Hospital management, government authorities"}]}
